setTimeout(function() { subscribedmodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); if (subscribedmodal) { subscribedmodal.classList.add('hide'); subscribedmodal.classList.remove('show'); } } function withoutLoginClicked(withoutlogin_id) { localStorage.setItem('subscribe_without_Login', 'true'); localStorage.setItem('subscribe_clicked_id', withoutlogin_id); } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const subscribewithoutData = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_without_Login'); const subscribe_clicked_cat_id = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); // Function to get cookies function getCookie(name) { let value = "; " + document.cookie; let parts = value.split("; " + name + "="); if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } });

title: Crypto Price Analysis February-14: ETH, XRP, ADA, BNB, and SOL
body: This week, we examine Ethereum, Ripple, Cardano, Binance Coin, and Solana in greater detail. Ethereum (ETH) There are good signs that Ethereum may have bottomed here and a reversal is just beginning after a difficult start in February. While the price is only up by 1% this week, this reversal could bring back buyers and see the cryptocurrency make more gains later. ETH found good support at $2,600, and if it manages to break above $2,800, then it will have a chance to return on a sustained rally that can get it back above $3,000. While buyers are still shy, they have a real opportunity to take back the control. Looking ahead, the remaining weeks in February could see Ethereum make steady gains. To be confident this can happen, bulls will have to break above $2,800 and $3,000. Chart by Tradingview Ripple ( XRP ) XRP had a great week after its price increased by 16%. Even so, it did not manage to reach $3 or go above that level which continues to act as a key resistance. Until XRP breaks above this psychological level, there is still a threat of sellers returning. The current momentum is bullish and may well be enough to test the key resistance. The question is if XRP can break $3 and turn it into a key support. If successful, then the price will be free to get closer to $3.4 which is the current all-time high. Looking ahead, XRP needs to show higher highs and higher lows to return on a clear uptrend. Until that happens, it’s best to be cautious here. Chart by Tradingview Cardano (ADA) ADA found great support at 64 cents, and since then, the price made steady gains increasing by 13% this week. The biggest challenge on the chart right now is the resistance at 90 cents which will likely try to prevent any attempts from buyers to take this cryptocurrency back to $1 or beyond. While the current momentum is bullish, buyers have to turn 90 cents into a key support to consolidate their positions. Until then, sellers could return at any moment to regain control. Looking ahead, ADA has a real chance to reverse the downtrend here. While the current gains are encouraging, bulls will have to maintain this momentum to be successful. Chart by Tradingview Binance Coin (BNB) Binance Coin had a great week with a 15% price increase after buyers rushed to this cryptocurrency which went above $700 for a brief period. However, sellers came in force there and managed to push back the price under this key level which also serves as a resistance. While $700 remains a stronghold for sellers, bulls managed to take BNB to a very comfortable level in the past 10 days. This allowed them to recover a lot of lost ground after the price touched $500 in early February. Looking ahead, this cryptocurrency may take its time to break above $700, but this could eventually happen once buyers gather the strength for a new push. For now, sellers seem determined to make a stand at the key resistance. Chart by Tradingview Solana (SOL) Unfortunately for Solana, it did not really move much this past week, closing with a modest 1.7% price increase. This mirrors Ethereum’s price action, but in the case of SOL, it could be interpreted as a sign of weakness. The resistance is found at $206 and buyers failed to break it despite several attempts in February. While this key level may fall if the overall market returns on an uptrend, Solana seems to struggle to find buyers at this time. Looking ahead, if sellers return, Solana has good support at $164 and could revisit this level before buyers become interested again. The alternative is a clean break above $206 which can improve the sentiment and begin a new rally. Chart by Tradingview The post Crypto Price Analysis February-14: ETH, XRP, ADA, BNB, and SOL appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Crypto Whale Bets Big On CZ’s Dog, BROCCOLI Price Rockets 160%
body: A crypto whale has placed a massive bet on CZ’s DOG (BROCCOLI) token, a meme coin inspired by Binance founder Changpeng Zhao’s (CZ) dog. This move has fueled a 160% surge in BROCCOLI price, making it one of the hottest tokens in the market. Notably, social media hype and speculation continue to push its value higher, with whale transactions adding to the frenzy. Crypto Whale Buys 40M CZ’s Dog; Becomes Largest Holder A crypto whale recently acquired nearly 40 million Broccoli tokens, becoming its largest holder. According to Loononchain data , the whale spent 7,431 BNB, worth approximately $5 million, to buy CZ’s Dog at an average price of $0.1264. This transaction has heightened investor interest, driving further demand for the token. Meanwhile, another report revealed that a separate whale invested $2.54 million in two Broccoli-themed memecoins. While one investment has yielded a 24.7% profit, the other is currently at a 68.1% loss. Source: Lookonchain, X Despite these mixed results, the crypto whales continue to dive into CZ-inspired tokens, believing in their potential for further growth. Besides, the influence of the former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao has further added to the bullish sentiment of the asset market. CZ’s Dog Sparks Meme Coin Frenzy: BROCCOLI Price Soars Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, aka CZ, first revealed his dog’s name Broccoli in a social media post on X on February 13. This announcement ignited a wave of Broccoli-themed meme coins across various blockchain networks. Over 480 Broccoli tokens have launched on Solana’s Pump.fun, while BNB Smart Chain’s Four.Meme has seen at least 300 similar tokens emerge, gaining the crypto whales’ attention. Among these, one Broccoli-themed memecoin on Solana skyrocketed to a $1.5 billion market cap on the same day. However, despite the overwhelming hype, CZ clarified that he has no involvement in launching any of these tokens. Meanwhile, a token, CZ’s Dog or BROCCOLI price rocketed 158% to $0.1335 today with a market cap of $122.56 million. Notably, the 24-hour trading volume of the token touched $604.01 million, indicating the heavy interest of the market participants towards the crypto. Broccoli Price Broccoli Price Surge Aids In Dog-Themed Meme Coins’ Rally Dog-themed memecoins have dominated the crypto scene lately, with crypto whales shifting their focus towards the assets. Notably, the buzz over the BROCCOLI token places it alongside other top dog-themed meme coins like Dogecoin (DOGE), Floki Inu (FLOKI), and Dogwifhat (WIF), all of which have seen significant price rallies. As of writing, DOGE price was up over 3.5% and traded at $0.2672, with SHIB and FLOKI adding about 1% to their prices. Besides, DOG price surged more than 4% while dogwifhat (WIF) price jumped more than 10% amid the CZ’s Dog buzz. However, the growing interest in dog-themed memecoins isn’t new. Despite that, CZ’s influence and the ongoing whale activity have made Broccoli a standout token in this category. As the meme coin market remains highly speculative, investors are closely watching Broccoli’s next moves. The post Crypto Whale Bets Big On CZ’s Dog, BROCCOLI Price Rockets 160% appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Coinbase Benefits From Strong Near-Term Momentum, 2025 Is Off to a Good Start: JMP
body: Coinbase (COIN) finished 2024 with very strong business momentum as sentiment about the wider digital asset industry improved, broker JMP said in a research report on Thursday after the crypto exchange's fourth quarter results . JMP raised its Coinbase price target to $475 from $400 and reiterated its market outperform rating. The shares dropped 1.3% to $294.30 in early trading, after rising 8.4% on Thursday. Wall Street may be underestimating the company's prospects, JMP said. "You ain't seen nothing yet," analysts led by Devin Ryan wrote, and if the "transaction pace continues, 1Q25 revenues would exceed current Street consensus by nearly 30%." There is a "seismic shift" happening in the industry, the report said, and the crypto exchange's positive momentum doesn't reflect some of the changes that are still yet to come. JMP expects huge growth for Coinbase and estimates that the company will be multiples of its current size in the coming five years. "The regulatory and legislative backdrop is now supportive for the next chapter of crypto," the report added. Read more: Coinbase Posts $2.27B in Q4 Revenue, Blowing Through $1.84B Estimate

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Reclaims $97K, Ripple (XRP) Soars by 12% Daily (Market Watch)
body: The cryptocurrency market has shown some resurgence in the past 24 hours, with numerous leading digital assets charting mild gains. Bitcoin (BTC), for instance, climbed by 1% and surpassed $97,000 again. Many of the well-known altcoins have performed much better than the primary cryptocurrency. Ripple’s XRP is the most evident example, with its valuation jumping by double digits. BTC is Slowly Recovering It has been a rather shaky week for Bitcoin (BTC), whose price fluctuated between under $95,000 and almost $100,000. It traded near the upper mark on February 7, but in the following days, it suffered a severe downfall. BTC Price, Source: CoinGecko The price tumbled to its local bottom of less than $95,000 on February 12, shortly after the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics released the Consumer Price Index data for January . The actual inflation rate was higher than expectations which caused the entire crypto market to head south. The following day, though, BTC bulls regained control and pushed the valuation to as high as $98,000. However, the rally was short-lived, and the price once again plunged below $95,500. Over the past several hours, though, there has been a new resurgence, and BTC currently trades just north of $97,000. The asset’s market capitalization is well above $1.9 trillion, whereas its dominance against the alternative coins slightly decreased to approximately 59.6% (per CoinMarketCap’s data). XRP Shoots Up As mentioned above, most altcoins have outperformed BTC in terms of daily gains. The biggest rival – Ethereum (ETH) – is up by 1.5%, while Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE), and Cardano (ADA) have witnessed increases of 3% to 5%. The best performer from the top 20 club today is undoubtedly Ripple’s XRP. Its price soared by 12%, reaching a 10-day high of $2.75. This happened shortly after the US SEC acknowledged Grayscale’s application to convert its XRP Trust into an exchange-traded fund (ETF). While the sector’s landscape is predominantly green, there are some assets experiencing decreases. Binance Coin (BNB), which was at the forefronts of gains on February 13, is down 5% in the last 24 hours, whereas TRON (TRX) has slipped by 3%. The total cryptocurrency market capitalization has climbed to $3.23 trillion, representing a 1.5% increase for the day. Cryptocurrency Market Overview, Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Bitcoin (BTC) Reclaims $97K, Ripple (XRP) Soars by 12% Daily (Market Watch) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Decoding Crypto Fear & Greed: Index Signals Steady Neutral Market Sentiment
body: Are you feeling a sense of calm amidst the crypto chaos, or perhaps a bit uncertain about where the market is headed? The latest Crypto Fear & Greed Index reading might just mirror your sentiments! As of February 14th, the index sits at a score of 48, a slight dip of two points from the previous day, but crucially, it remains firmly planted in the ‘Neutral’ zone. This indicator, a brainchild of Alternative.me, serves as a vital compass for navigating the often turbulent waters of cryptocurrency investments. Let’s dive into what this neutral reading means and how you can use the Crypto Fear & Greed Index to your advantage. Understanding the Crypto Fear and Greed Index: Your Sentiment Compass Imagine having a tool that attempts to quantify the emotional temperature of the crypto market. That’s precisely what the Crypto Fear & Greed Index aims to do. This index operates on a simple yet insightful scale from 0 to 100. A score of 0 represents ‘Extreme Fear,’ suggesting investors are overly pessimistic, which historically can be a potential buying opportunity. Conversely, a score of 100 signifies ‘Extreme Greed,’ indicating an overly bullish market that might be due for a correction. The midpoint, 50, represents ‘Neutral’ sentiment, a state of market equilibrium where neither fear nor greed dominates. Currently hovering at 48, the index suggests a market that is taking a breather, neither overly enthusiastic nor excessively panicked. But how does this index actually work its magic? Decoding the Metrics: What Drives the Crypto Fear and Greed Index? The Crypto Fear & Greed Index isn’t based on gut feelings or guesswork. It’s a data-driven tool that aggregates six key market indicators to paint a comprehensive picture of market sentiment . Let’s break down these components: Volatility (25%): Volatility measures the speed and magnitude of price fluctuations. High volatility often correlates with fear in the market as investors become anxious about rapid price swings. The index analyzes the current and maximum drawdowns of Bitcoin and compares them with the corresponding average values of the last 30 and 90 days. Increased volatility contributes to a higher ‘fear’ reading. Market Momentum/Volume (25%): This factor examines the market’s trading volume and momentum in comparison to recent averages. High buying volumes and strong positive momentum suggest greed, while low volumes and negative momentum can indicate fear. The index compares the current market momentum and volume against the 30 and 90-day averages, providing insights into whether the market is trending upwards or downwards with conviction. Social Media (15%): Social media sentiment is a powerful reflection of public opinion. The index analyzes sentiment on platforms like Twitter and Reddit, specifically looking at crypto-related hashtags and keywords. An increase in positive sentiment typically leans towards greed, while negative sentiment points to fear. This aspect captures the ‘buzz’ and overall mood within the crypto community. Surveys (15%): While not always available daily, periodic crypto surveys gauge investor sentiment directly. These surveys ask participants about their current market outlook and expectations. Bullish survey results contribute to a ‘greed’ reading, whereas bearish responses push the index towards ‘fear’. Bitcoin Dominance (10%): Bitcoin Dominance measures Bitcoin’s market capitalization relative to the rest of the cryptocurrency market. Increased Bitcoin dominance can sometimes signal a ‘risk-off’ sentiment, as investors may flock to Bitcoin as a perceived safer haven during market uncertainty. Conversely, decreasing Bitcoin dominance, with altcoins gaining ground, can indicate a risk-on, or ‘greedier’ market phase. The index analyzes shifts in Bitcoin dominance to further refine its sentiment assessment. Google Trends (10%): Google Trends data provides insights into search queries related to Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Surges in searches like ‘Bitcoin price prediction’ or ‘buy Bitcoin’ can indicate increasing interest and potentially greed. Conversely, spikes in searches like ‘Bitcoin crash’ or ‘crypto sell-off’ might suggest fear. This factor taps into the general public’s interest and concerns about the crypto market. Neutral Crypto Market: What Does a Score of 48 Really Mean? A Neutral Crypto Market , as indicated by a score of 48, suggests a state of equilibrium. It’s a zone where neither extreme fear nor excessive greed is dictating market movements. This can be interpreted in several ways: Market Consolidation: Neutral sentiment often occurs during periods of market consolidation. After a significant uptrend or downtrend, the market may pause to digest gains or losses. A neutral index could indicate that the market is in a phase of stabilization, waiting for new catalysts to emerge. Uncertainty and Indecision: Neutrality can also reflect uncertainty in the market. Investors may be unsure about the future direction, leading to a balance between buying and selling pressures. This indecision can stem from various factors, such as macroeconomic events, regulatory developments, or technological advancements in the crypto space. Opportunity for Strategic Positioning: For astute investors, a neutral market can present opportunities. It’s a time to carefully analyze individual cryptocurrencies, assess their fundamentals, and potentially accumulate positions in projects with strong long-term potential. While extreme fear can signal deep value and extreme greed can warn of bubbles, neutrality allows for more calculated and less emotionally driven investment decisions. Navigating Crypto Volatility with the Fear & Greed Index Crypto Volatility is inherent to the digital asset space. The Fear & Greed Index can be a valuable tool for navigating these volatile waters. Here’s how: Index Range Sentiment Potential Market Interpretation Investor Action 0-24 Extreme Fear Market likely oversold, potential bottoming out Consider buying opportunities, long-term accumulation 25-49 Fear Market is bearish, but may be approaching a turning point Cautious accumulation, research undervalued assets 50-75 Greed Market is bullish, potential for continued growth but increasing risk Profit-taking, portfolio rebalancing, cautious optimism 76-100 Extreme Greed Market likely overbought, potential bubble territory Consider selling, reduce exposure, prepare for correction It’s crucial to remember that the Fear & Greed Index is just one tool in your investment arsenal. It shouldn’t be used in isolation but rather in conjunction with other forms of technical and fundamental analysis. Think of it as a sentiment gauge that can provide context to your overall market assessment. Actionable Insights: Leveraging the Neutral Signal So, what should you do with this ‘Neutral’ reading of 48? Here are some actionable insights: Review Your Portfolio: A neutral market is an excellent time to review your crypto portfolio. Are your assets aligned with your long-term goals? Are you comfortable with your risk exposure? Use this period of calm to make strategic adjustments. Conduct Deeper Research: Instead of reacting impulsively to market swings, use this neutral phase to conduct in-depth research on promising crypto projects. Understand their technology, tokenomics, and long-term viability. Dollar-Cost Averaging: If you believe in the long-term potential of cryptocurrencies, a neutral market can be a good time to implement dollar-cost averaging. This strategy involves investing a fixed amount of money at regular intervals, regardless of the price, helping to mitigate the impact of volatility. Stay Informed: Keep a close eye on market developments, news, and regulatory updates. While the index is currently neutral, sentiment can shift rapidly. Staying informed will help you react proactively to any changes. Conclusion: Navigating the Nuances of Market Sentiment The Crypto Fear & Greed Index, currently signaling a ‘Neutral’ market sentiment , offers a valuable snapshot of the crypto market’s emotional state. While it’s not a crystal ball, it serves as a powerful indicator of prevailing investor psychology. By understanding how the index works, what its various readings signify, and how to integrate it into your broader investment strategy, you can navigate the crypto market with greater clarity and make more informed decisions. The current neutrality suggests a period of balance, offering a window for strategic planning and thoughtful action rather than impulsive reactions driven by fear or greed. Use this ‘neutral’ phase wisely to position yourself for the next market move, whatever direction it may take. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.
tags: Crypto News|BITCOIN|Bitcoin market analysis|Crypto Market|CRYPTOCURRENCY|Fear and Greed Index

title: China’s DeepSeek is redefining the data center market
body: CNBC projected that the emergence of cheaper AI models from China could increase the demand for data centers. Analysts reportedly tilted their forecasts after DeepSeek’s launch, anticipating immediate impacts on the industry. A report by CNBC indicated that Artificial Intelligence models built more cheaply with less powerful chips could boost the data center market. The report noted that some analysts reviewed their forecasts after DeepSeek’s launch. China’s cheaper AI models, such as DeepSeek, could reshape data center demand Analysts forecasted that data centers would experience growth in the coming years, especially after the launch of OpenAI’s ChatGPT. Newmark estimated that U.S data demand will double by 2030 to accommodate Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications. How China's DeepSeek could boost the already booming data center market https://t.co/x9kuk5cCTu — CNBC (@CNBC) February 14, 2025 Chinese startup DeepSeek launched last month, introducing a free, open-source large language model. The startup claimed it had spent under $6 million on its development. Investors reacted to the launch by questioning the large amounts of money institutions put into artificial intelligence and data centers. Some analysts reportedly altered their forecasts on data center demand, raising questions about whether the funds pumped into the AI industry were misguided. The report highlighted that data centers take approximately two years to build, and orders for 2025 have already been placed. It added that launching an RI model such as DeepSeek was unlikely to have an immediate impact. In a note published in late January, a group of analysts led by Brenda Lynch also commented on DeepSeek’s launch. They highlighted that confirmation of DeepSeek’s efficiency claims would show that the money allocated to AI development was misguided. The analysts concluded that such an event would require tech companies to reconsider their spending plans. They added that if AI needed less deployment infrastructure, it would lead to lower-quality facilities with the least energy efficiency facing weaker demands. Analysts project R1 model launch is unlikely to alter market demand Meanwhile, UBS analysts noted that one-third of the current bullish data center market projections relied on the development of generative AI. They added that the bullish forecasts did not consider improvements in efficiency such as the one highlighted by DeepSeek. In April, UBS forecasted the global data center equipment would grow by approximately 15% in three years. The analysts reviewed the forecasts this week, adding that new data and expert opinions lead to higher market projections. The firm revealed it expected the AI industry and data center sector to grow 20% this year. UBS maintained its 10% to 15% projection through 2026-2028. Andre Kukhin, equity research analyst at UBS, explained that while DeepSeek was more efficient per token, it needed more tokens per question. He noted that it was a reasoning model rather than a “flow of speech.” Kukhin expressed that he did not think the model would reduce the demand for power for inference. Goldman Sachs’ research department projected that data center supply and demand could be altered in the following years. The department revealed that demand could peak in late 2026 and then moderate in 2027. James Schneider, senior equity research analyst at Goldman Sachs, commented that if efficiency gains drove lower capital expenditures from major investors, it could mitigate the risk of long-term market oversupply projected in 2027 and beyond. He added that this was an important consideration that could increase the durability of the data center market. Andrew McMillan, partner at RPC law firm, mentioned that a lot was yet to be determined on the impact of Deepseek’s technology, given it was still in its nascent stages. He noted that R1 could not tilt the AI industry’s demand and supply balance. McMillan projected that investor appetite would be tempered if the technology could be shown to be replicable, leading to lower demand for data processing in the future than there is now. title: Financial experts Raoul Pal, Howell Discuss Liquidity Cycles and Wealth Transfer: Bitcoin, Gold, and the Future of Money
body: Liquidity cycles drive asset booms, favoring Bitcoin, gold, and tech stocks. Monetary inflation is shifting wealth from older generations to younger investors. Governments are likely to continue debasing currencies to manage debt. Financial expert Raoul Pal and CEO of CrossBorder Capital Michael Howell recently broke down the ongoing liquidity cycle and its impact on global markets. The analysis highlighted how central banks continue to inject liquidity into financial systems, fueling asset price growth and driving a generational wealth shift. Gold and Bitcoin, often seen as hedges against currency devaluation, remain key assets in this environment. Pal, the session host, noted that while gold retains its value over time, Bitcoin’s technological adoption gives it additional upside potential. “Bitcoin has been a savior for young investors looking to avoid fiat currency debasement,” he said. Wealth Transfer – 1920s Germany Parallels? Meanwhile, Howell drew comparisons between today’s monetary policies and Germany’s hyperinflation in the 1920s. title: Breaking: SEC Acknowledges Dogecoin ETF Filing – A Shockwave for Crypto ETF Hopes?
body: Hold onto your digital wallets, Dogecoin enthusiasts! The crypto world is buzzing with electrifying news: the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has officially acknowledged the filing for a Dogecoin exchange-traded fund (ETF). While still early days, this development, reported by Bloomberg’s senior ETF analyst Eric Balchunas, injects a surge of optimism into the often-turbulent waters of meme coin investments. Could this be the monumental shift the market has been waiting for? Let’s dive into what this groundbreaking SEC acknowledgement means for Dogecoin and the broader crypto ETF landscape. Is a Dogecoin ETF Finally on the Horizon? For years, the idea of a Dogecoin ETF seemed like a distant dream, perhaps even a meme in itself. After all, Dogecoin, born from an internet joke, has often been viewed as a volatile and speculative asset by traditional financial institutions. However, the SEC’s acknowledgement of the filing suggests a potential shift in perspective, or at least a willingness to formally consider such a product. Eric Balchunas’ tweet, which sent ripples across Crypto Twitter, highlights the significance: [blockquote class=”twitter-tweet”][tweet url=”https://twitter.com/EricBalchunas/status/1770821822482264148″] Balchunas emphasizes that while acknowledgement is a standard procedural step, it carries weight because previous attempts to file for altcoin ETFs were swiftly withdrawn. This subtle difference signals that the Dogecoin ETF proposal might have cleared an initial, albeit low, hurdle. But what exactly does this acknowledgement entail, and what are the next steps? Decoding the SEC ETF Filing Acknowledgement The SEC ETF Filing process is complex and rigorous, designed to protect investors and maintain market integrity. Acknowledgement of a filing simply means the SEC has received and registered the application; it’s not an endorsement or indication of approval. Think of it as the SEC saying, “Okay, we see you. Let’s take a look.” Here’s a simplified breakdown of what this stage means and what to expect: Formal Review Begins: The SEC will now formally review the specifics of the proposed Dogecoin ETF. This includes examining the fund’s structure, the custodian holding the Dogecoin, risk assessment, and compliance with regulatory requirements. Public Comment Period: Typically, there will be a period for public comment, allowing individuals and organizations to express their views on the proposed ETF. This is crucial as it provides diverse perspectives and can influence the SEC’s decision. SEC Scrutiny: Expect intense scrutiny. The SEC will likely delve into the volatility of Dogecoin, market manipulation concerns, and the overall suitability of a meme coin ETF for mainstream investors. Potential for Rejection or Approval: The outcome is far from certain. The SEC could reject the filing, request amendments, or ultimately approve it. The journey from filing to approval is often lengthy and fraught with challenges. While acknowledgement is a positive signal, it’s crucial to maintain realistic expectations. The path to Crypto ETF Approval is rarely straightforward, especially for assets like Dogecoin that fall outside the traditional scope of cryptocurrency investments like Bitcoin and Ethereum. Crypto ETF Approval: A Broader Perspective The anticipation surrounding a Dogecoin ETF is intertwined with the broader narrative of crypto ETF approvals in the United States. The recent approval of Bitcoin ETFs marked a watershed moment, opening the doors for institutional and retail investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin through regulated investment vehicles. Ethereum ETFs are also widely expected to follow suit. But where does Dogecoin fit into this evolving landscape? Here’s a comparative look at the ETF approval landscape: Cryptocurrency ETF Status in US Key Considerations for Approval Bitcoin Approved (Spot ETFs) Market maturity, regulatory clarity, established institutional interest. Ethereum Awaiting decision (Spot ETFs) Strong market cap, active development community, similar regulatory considerations as Bitcoin. Dogecoin Filing Acknowledged (Spot ETF) High volatility, meme coin status, market manipulation risks, less established institutional support. As the table indicates, Dogecoin faces unique hurdles compared to Bitcoin and Ethereum. Its classification as a Meme Coin ETF introduces an entirely new dimension to the SEC’s evaluation process. Will the SEC be willing to extend ETF access to assets primarily driven by social media trends and online communities? Meme Coin ETF: Paving the Way or a Risky Bet? The potential approval of a Dogecoin ETF could be seen as a double-edged sword. On one hand, it could legitimize meme coins as an asset class, attracting more mainstream investment and further propelling the crypto market into the public consciousness. It could also provide Dogecoin holders with a regulated and accessible investment avenue within traditional financial markets. However, the challenges are equally significant: Increased Volatility Concerns: Meme coins are notoriously volatile. An ETF could amplify these price swings, potentially exposing investors to heightened risks. Market Manipulation Vulnerability: Dogecoin’s price is heavily influenced by social media sentiment and influencer activity, raising concerns about market manipulation within an ETF structure. Investor Protection Dilemma: The SEC’s primary mandate is investor protection. Approving a meme coin ETF could be perceived as endorsing highly speculative investments, potentially conflicting with this mandate. Despite these challenges, the acknowledgement of the Dogecoin ETF filing indicates a willingness by the SEC to at least consider venturing into uncharted territory. The outcome will likely set a precedent for future filings of ETFs based on other meme coins or similarly unconventional crypto assets. Staying Ahead with ETF News and Market Insights For investors navigating the dynamic world of cryptocurrency ETFs, staying informed is paramount. ETF News and real-time market analysis are crucial tools for making informed decisions. Here are some actionable insights to consider: Follow Reputable News Sources: Keep track of updates from established financial news outlets and crypto-specific news platforms. Monitor SEC Filings and Announcements: The SEC’s website provides public access to filings and official statements regarding ETF applications. Engage with Crypto Analyst Insights: Follow reputable crypto analysts and ETF experts on social media and platforms like Bloomberg for informed perspectives. Understand ETF Risks and Structures: Before investing in any ETF, thoroughly research its underlying assets, management fees, and risk factors. Diversify Your Portfolio: Never put all your eggs in one basket. Diversification across different asset classes, including crypto and traditional investments, is a sound risk management strategy. The Dogecoin ETF saga is just beginning, and the road ahead is uncertain. However, this development marks a significant milestone in the evolution of crypto ETFs and the mainstream acceptance of even the most unconventional digital assets. Whether it ultimately leads to approval or rejection, the journey will undoubtedly be a captivating one for the crypto community and the financial world alike. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Dogecoin adoption.

title: Ethereum’s Pectra Upgrade Set for April 8: What It Means for ETH Investors
body: The post Ethereum’s Pectra Upgrade Set for April 8: What It Means for ETH Investors appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum developers have confirmed that the highly anticipated Pectra upgrade will undergo testing on the Holesky and Sepolia networks on February 24 and March 5, respectively. If these tests run smoothly, the upgrade is scheduled to go live on the Ethereum mainnet on April 8. The decision was made during the Ethereum All Core Developers Execution (ACDE) Call 205 on February 13, 2025, chaired by ethereum foundation ethereum foundation - info@ethereum.org Event Organiser Protocol Support Lead Tim Beiko was Debate over Fusaka Planning During the meeting, developers confirmed that client teams are on track to release software for the testnet upgrades. Beiko also proposed freezing the scope of Ethereum’s next upgrade, Fusaka, by the time Pectra goes live. However, representatives from the Geth team opposed this, arguing that the timeline was too short and that one of the proposed Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs), EOF, should be excluded. To solve the issue, Beiko suggested giving developers more time—one month instead of two weeks—to work on their ideas for Fusaka. He also made it easier for the Geth team to share their opinions by allowing them to give feedback individually instead of all together at once. What Does This Mean for ETH? The Pectra upgrade could have a big impact on Ethereum’s future. First, it will improve the network’s speed and lower transaction costs, making Ethereum more competitive with other blockchains . It will also make Ethereum safer and more user-friendly, attracting more developers and investors. For ETH holders, the upgrade could boost confidence in Ethereum, leading to increased adoption and potentially driving up the price. However, as with any major upgrade, there could be short-term volatility as the market reacts. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Ethereum Whale Sell-off 20,000 ETH, Traders’ Eyes on $2,200 , Ethereum’s Future Amid Leadership Changes Moreover, Ethereum’s upgrades come at a time of internal leadership change within the Ethereum Foundation. Leadership change has sparked concerns over governance and neutrality. vitalik buterin vitalik buterin Vitalik Buterin is a professional programmer and Co-Founder of Ethereum. Buterin, along with Gavin Wood, Charles Hoskinson, Joseph Lubin, and Anthony Di, launched Ethereum in 2014. He co-created Ethereum when he understood that he could construct a new, possibly enhanced version by iterating on the Bitcoin blockchain. He has been involved in the Bitcoin community since 2011, writing and co-founding articles for Bitcoin magazine. Details:Organization: EthereumLocation: CanadaEducation: Vitalik graduated from the University of Waterloo (2012–2014)Skills: Computer programming and writing Awards:Honored with the Thiel Fellowship Award in 2014.Won the World Technology Network prize.Fortune's 40 under 40 list and appeared on the Under 30 list of Forbes at the age of 23Experience:He has been the founder of Ethereum from November 2013 to the present.Buterin has contributed as a developer to other open-source software projects. He also contributed to DarkWallet.Buterin has been involved in various initiatives to improve blockchain technology and its applications.FAQ1. Who is Vitalik Buterin?One of the most well-known figures in the cryptocurrency space is Vitalik Buterin, who co-founded Ethereum, one of the biggest and most significant blockchain systems.2. What is the net worth of Vitalik?Vitalik's net worth is 32 billion dollars, according to Forbes.3. What does Vitalik Buterin invest in?Vitalik Buterin has made numerous investments in companies like Varro Life Sciences, Polymarket, and RISE (Singapore) within the healthcare technology systems, information services (B2C), and financial software industries. coinpedia@gmail.com Entrepreneur Crypto and Blockchain Expert recently confirmed efforts to resolve governance issues, which could impact Ethereum’s future direction. title: Remixpoint’s Crypto Bet Pays Off Amid Market Shifts
body: The post Remixpoint’s Crypto Bet Pays Off Amid Market Shifts appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Japanese energy firm Remixpoint boosted its crypto holdings by over 8,000% in nine months, investing 9 billion yen ($59 million), mainly in Bitcoin. The move aligns with its strategy to hedge against the yen’s depreciation, mirroring Metaplanet’s approach. Following Donald Trump’s election win, the firm accelerated crypto accumulation, sending its shares up 360%. Despite reporting a 1.35 billion yen profit and unrealized gains, shares fell 15% after its Q3 earnings report. Remixpoint now nears its 10 billion yen ($65 million) crypto investment target as it expands into digital asset services.

title: Coinbase CEO Makes Bold Crypto Prediction Under Trump Administration
body: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong believes the U.S. is entering a transformative phase for cryptocurrency, calling it the “dawn of a new era for crypto.” He also forecasted that by 2030, as much as 10% of global GDP could be crypto-based. “Up to 10% of global GDP could be running on crypto rails by the end of this decade,” Armstrong stated during Coinbase’s fourth-quarter 2024 earnings call on Feb. 13. He likened today’s crypto adoption to the early 2000s when businesses had to adapt to the internet. “Onchain is the new online,” he said. If his prediction holds, it would mean more than $10 trillion worth of assets would be tokenized or onchain, given the World Bank’s estimate of over $100 trillion in global GDP. Armstrong emphasized Coinbase’s role in this shift, telling investors: “Coinbase is going to be the preferred partner to come in and build this for many of the companies out there.” The company reported $2.3 billion in Q4 revenue, marking an 88% increase quarter-over-quarter. He also highlighted the U.S.’s role in shaping crypto’s future, noting that “President Trump is moving fast to fulfill his promise of making the US the crypto capital of the planet.” Armstrong further pointed out that the U.S. now has its “most pro-crypto Congress,” which is advancing stablecoin and market structure legislation that could influence global adoption. “Given the US leadership here, the rest of the world is taking notice and will be under pressure to embrace crypto adoption,” he said. Meanwhile, Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller recently advocated for stablecoin regulations that would allow banks to issue dollar-pegged digital assets. Looking ahead, Armstrong said Coinbase’s focus will be on “growing revenue with our existing products” while driving utility in emerging crypto sectors and building the foundation for long-term growth.

title: Crypto Whale Fuels Broccoli Surge as Meme Coin Frenzy Heats Up
body: The post Crypto Whale Fuels Broccoli Surge as Meme Coin Frenzy Heats Up appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News A crypto whale scooped up 40 million Broccoli tokens, spending $5 million to become its largest holder. This triggered a 160% price surge, fueled by social media hype and increased investor interest. Inspired by Binance founder CZ’s dog, Broccoli-themed meme coins have flooded the market, with one even hitting a $1.5 billion market cap. DOGE, FLOKI, and WIF have also rallied alongside Broccoli. Despite CZ clarifying he isn’t involved, whale activity continues to drive momentum, making Broccoli one of the most-watched tokens in the meme coin space.

title: Ethereum Developers Confirm Pectra Testnet Upgrade Schedule
body: The post Ethereum Developers Confirm Pectra Testnet Upgrade Schedule appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum developers have set key dates for the Pectra upgrade, planning to activate it on the Holesky testnet on February 24 and Sepolia on March 5. If successful, Pectra could go live on the Ethereum mainnet around April 8. During the latest Ethereum Core Developer call, they also discussed Beiko’s proposal to finalize the Fusaka upgrade scope before Pectra’s launch. Additionally, Beiko suggested extending the EIP submission period to allow broader discussions. These developments mark crucial steps in Ethereum’s continuous evolution and upgrade process.

title: Arthur Hayes says meme coins will dominate political adverts in 2026
body: Arthur Hayes says meme coins are about to take over political campaigns. The former BitMEX CEO believes the 2026 midterms will see politicians ditch traditional ads and embrace blockchain-powered digital assets to drive voter engagement. “Political campaigns won’t just use meme coins—they’ll depend on them,” Arthur said in a statement published on his blog. He argues that meme coins will become the new political currency, replacing outdated polling methods and shaking up campaign finance. “A politician’s popularity will be measured in real-time, not by unreliable surveys but by how much people are willing to invest in their token,” Arthur said. In his post , Arthur says the days of billion-dollar ad spending on TV and radio are numbered, pointing to the 2012 US presidential election, where Barack Obama and Mitt Romney spent a combined $2.6 billion on traditional advertising. “That money went into a black hole,” said Arthur. “Now imagine if, instead of dumping billions into TV networks, campaigns issued their own meme coins. Voters wouldn’t just listen—they’d invest.” Arthur says the shift began in 2016 when Donald Trump, lacking a massive war chest, used social media to dominate the election cycle. Instead of relying on big donors, he leveraged Facebook’s micro-targeting tools and Twitter’s real-time engagement to outmaneuver his opponents. By 2024, Trump went a step further, launching his own memecoin, $TRUMP. Trump’s memecoin has already demonstrated its power. Arthur says the token functions as an open market measure of political sentiment. “If $TRUMP is up, it means people believe in him. If it crashes, they don’t,” he said. “There’s no need for pollsters. The blockchain doesn’t lie.” The rise of political prediction markets Arthur says the next step is a full integration of meme coins into election forecasting. He points to Polymarket, a decentralized prediction market that allows users to bet on political outcomes using crypto. In 2024, Polymarket’s Trump vs. Kamala Harris prediction market became a key indicator of global sentiment, showing Trump as the clear favorite despite mainstream media polls suggesting otherwise. “The US government went after Polymarket because it exposed their lies,” Arthur said. Regulators cracked down after the platform’s markets contradicted the official narrative that Joe Biden was the Democratic frontrunner. “The truth was out there, on-chain, in real-time,” he said. “Polymarket’s numbers didn’t match the propaganda, so they had to shut it down.” Arthur says political meme coins will function as an even more decentralized version of prediction markets. “They can’t ban every memecoin,” he said. “Even if governments shut down prediction markets, they can’t stop people from trading a politician’s token.” He believes meme coins will become an unstoppable force, serving as both a measure of public opinion and a campaign financing tool. Meme coins as voter engagement tools Arthur argues that meme coins will be the most powerful political mobilization tool ever created. “Voters are lazy,” he said. “They need a financial incentive to care.” He says meme coins will tie electoral participation directly to personal financial interest. “If you hold a candidate’s token, you have skin in the game. You want them to win because if they do, your bag pumps,” he said. This, he says, will be more effective than any ad campaign. “Forget TV commercials. Forget campaign rallies. Airdrop some meme coins to your supporters, and they’ll do the work for you.” He predicts a future where candidates reward supporters with token incentives for attending events, posting on social media, and even voting. Arthur says politicians who refuse to launch a memecoin will be at a disadvantage. “If your opponent has a memecoin and you don’t, you’re already losing,” he said. He believes political challengers, especially underfunded outsiders, will be the first to fully embrace meme coins. “They don’t have access to billion-dollar donors, but they have the internet. They have meme coins. And they will win,” he said. Meme coins in global politics But Arthur says political meme coins won’t be limited to the US, mentioning France, where regulators preemptively banned Polymarket despite no upcoming elections. “Macron knew what was coming,” he said. “A live market showing Marine Le Pen as the favorite would destroy him.” He also sees potential in Germany, where the right-wing AfD party is surging. “Imagine if every AfD candidate had their own token,” Arthur said. “If their meme coins pumped, it would be impossible to deny their popularity.” He believes meme coins could help insurgent parties gain power by proving their legitimacy in real-time markets. Even authoritarian regimes aren’t immune. Arthur suggests that Chinese President Xi Jinping might eventually launch a memecoin to prove his popularity. “The CCP controls everything, but they can’t fake an open market,” he said. “If they launched $XI and it tanked, the world would know.” A new era of campaign finance Arthur says meme coins will fundamentally change how political campaigns are funded. “Right now, politicians rely on shady billionaires and corporate donors,” he said. “With meme coins, they can raise money directly from their supporters.” He believes this will make campaigns more transparent while also giving voters a financial stake in the outcome. Arthur envisions a future where political meme coins trade on decentralized exchanges alongside major cryptocurrencies. “Imagine an ETF that tracks the popularity of an entire political party,” he said. “A Republican vs. Democrat token index. A Labour vs. Tory basket. The market will decide who’s winning.” He predicts a flood of political meme coins by 2026. “Every serious candidate will have one,” he said. “And if they don’t, their opponents will eat them alive.” He believes the first major test will come in the 2026 US midterms. “If you’re running in 2026 and you don’t have a memecoin, you’re already dead,” he said. Arthur says the shift is inevitable. “This isn’t a theory,” he said. “$TRUMP already exists. Political meme coins are here. The game has changed.” Cryptopolitan Academy: Are You Making These Web3 Resume Mistakes? - Find Out Here

title: BNB Price Targets $1,000 as CZ Brings Adoption to Binance Chain
body: The BNB price had a strong performance this week after the developers unveiled more ambitions for 2025. Binance Coin also surged after Changpeng Zhao (CZ) launched his meme coin, and after a judge agreed to a 60-day stay on a long-running case between the SEC and Binance. These actions, together with its cup and handle pattern points to a surge to $1,000. BNB Price Boosted by CZ’s Brings More Adoption to Binance Chain The BNB price is having a good week as activity in the ecosystem rises. One catalyst was CZ’s commitment to boost its network activity and ecosystem growth. This happened after CZ unveiled his dog, Broccoli , which led to more activity in the network. CZ then agreed with a user who said that meme coins were time bombs and recommended that the network focus on giving incentives to teams building utility coins. The user said : “ What made people leave the chain back when it was BSC was exactly all the rugs and scams, at one point it was unbearable. We already have that in other chains, we definitely don’t need more of it. Theres so much that can be done and built. We don’t need more memes.” Increased adoption will benefit the value of BNB since users will need the token to pay transactions. A good example of this is Solana, which has done well because of its strong ecosystem growth. BSC Chain Priorities for 2025 His statement came two days after the BSC Chain unveiled its priority for 2025. In an X thread , the developers noted that the key areas will be increasing transaction speeds so that it can get to 100 million transactions per day, introducing more AI features, reducing MEV, and allowing gasless transactions. BNB Chain priorities Further, the growing network activity increased Binance coin burn rate , and higher fees pushed the BNB staking yield to 103%, making it the highest-yielding crypto. These priorities will likely help the Binance Chain ecosystem do well. For example, PancakeSwap has overtaken Uniswap, Raydium, and Meteora in weekly transaction volume. It handled $21 billion worth of transactions compared to Uniswap’s $17 billion and Raydium’s $16 billion. Further, a judge in the US agreed to a request by Binance and SEC to pause proceedings in a long-running case. Binance Coin Price Analysis: C&H Points to More Gains The BNB price has more upside as it has formed a cup and handle pattern on the weekly chart. This pattern has three key sections: a rounded bottom, a top, and a handle. The upper side of this cup was at $661, its highest level in October 2021 and June last year. It then formed a rounded bottom whose bottom was around the $200 level. The coin has now been forming the handle section, meaning that a complete breakout could happen soon. This C&H had a depth of about 70%. Therefore, measuring the same distance from the upper side means that the coin may surge to $1,147. BNB Price Chart However, the rebound to this Binance coin price forecast may take time to happen since this is a weekly chart. For example, the handle section took about two months, while the cup section took three years to form. A drop below the handle section at $403 will invalidate the bullish BNB price outlook as it will cancel the C&H pattern. The post BNB Price Targets $1,000 as CZ Brings Adoption to Binance Chain appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Bitcoin Eyes $125K by June as Market Sentiment Remains Neutral
body: Bitcoin has struggled to break past the critical $100,000 level for the past week, but market analysts suggest that a significant upside move could be on the horizon. A new report by Dr. Sean Dawson, head of research at onchain options protocol Derive, indicates that BTC has a 44.4% chance of reaching $125,000 by late June—an increase from the previous 41.9% projection. Bitcoin Rally May Resume Soon Dawson also noted that the probability of Bitcoin dropping to $75,000 before June has declined to just 12.1%, down from 17.8%. His outlook suggests that Bitcoin’s risk-to-reward ratio remains favorable for bullish investors. Meanwhile, BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes has taken a more cautious stance. He previously warned that Bitcoin could temporarily retrace to the $70,000-$75,000 range, potentially triggering a “mini financial crisis.” Bitcoin last traded at $75,000 in early November, just days after Donald Trump’s election victory sparked a wave of optimism in the crypto market. At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading around $96,900, according to CoinMarketCap, continuing its consolidation below the $100,000 psychological level since Feb. 7. Choppy Trading Conditions Persist Despite the long-term bullish outlook, short-term market sentiment remains uncertain. Crypto trader Jelle noted that unless Bitcoin convincingly reclaims the $100,000 mark, “choppy conditions” are likely to persist. The Crypto Fear & Greed Index—a widely followed metric tracking market sentiment—currently sits at a “Neutral” score of 48, indicating an indecisive market. Traders remain split on whether Bitcoin will make another run toward its all-time high of $109,000, which it briefly hit on Jan. 20 before Trump’s inauguration. Meanwhile, asset manager VanEck remains highly optimistic about Bitcoin’s long-term trajectory. In a December 2024 report, the firm projected that BTC would reach a “medium-term peak” in the first quarter of 2025 before surging to new all-time highs later in the year. VanEck believes that Bitcoin could trade around $180,000 at the cycle’s apex, with Ethereum surpassing $6,000. The post Bitcoin Eyes $125K by June as Market Sentiment Remains Neutral appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Interest in Bitcoin Continues to Grow in US States! Another State Prepares to Allow Bitcoin Investments!
body: Michigan has become the latest US state to investigate cryptocurrency investments, with state representatives Bryan Posthumus and Ron Robinson introducing House Bill 4087. Michigan Proposes State Investment in Crypto Amid Growing US Trend If passed, the bill would allow Michigan to allocate up to 10% of its general and economic stabilization funds to cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. Posthumus, in a statement on X (formerly Twitter), highlighted Michigan’s potential to be a leader in state-level crypto policy: “Michigan can and should join Texas in leading the way on crypto policy by signing my bill creating the Michigan Crypto Strategic Reserve.” The bill aims to diversify the state’s investment portfolio, generating higher returns, while also allowing the state treasurer to lend out cryptocurrencies as a way to generate additional returns without increasing financial risk. This proposal is in line with the nationwide trend of states integrating cryptocurrency into financial strategies. Michigan has expressed interest in blockchain and digital assets since 2022, establishing a “Blockchain and Crypto Commission” specifically to investigate the growth of the sector. Currently, approximately 20 states have proposed or are actively considering legislation related to crypto reserves, including North Carolina, Texas, Pennsylvania, Ohio, and Oklahoma. The momentum behind these initiatives has accelerated, particularly following the pro-crypto stance of US President Donald Trump, who took office in January. If House Bill 4087 is approved, Michigan could become one of the first states to formally allocate state funds to cryptocurrencies, further solidifying digital assets as a key component of state investment strategies. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Interest in Bitcoin Continues to Grow in US States! Another State Prepares to Allow Bitcoin Investments!

title: First Lady, First Token: Breaking Down Melania Trump Crypto Ambitions
body: In an unexpected turn for the cryptocurrency sphere, Melania Trump, the current First Lady of the United States, has gone beyond NFTs and entered the wider digital space by launching her own meme coin, $MELANIA. This action introduces a new phase to her story in digital assets, highlighting her aspirations with Melania Trump crypto beyond her initial venture into NFTs. In this piece, we examine Melania Trump’s transition from art to tokens, assessing the effects, possibilities, and the impact of this evolution. Melania Trump’s Crypto Ambitions: From NFT Vision to Crypto Token Melania Trump made her official debut in the cryptocurrency space in late 2021 with her NFT series , “Melania’s Vision.” This digital piece, showcasing watercolor art and an audio note from Melania, was created on the Solana blockchain. The initiative showcased her passion for digital art while also working to advance her “Be Best” campaign by offering computer science education to youths aging out of foster care. NFT Launch: “Melania’s Vision” garnered positive attention, featuring auctions and sales that highlighted NFTs as a novel type of digital collectible linked to celebrity influence and charitable efforts. Ongoing NFT Pursuits: After the triumph of her initial collection, Melania remained active in the NFT arena, concentrating on unique digital collectibles frequently associated with patriotic and historical motifs, thereby strengthening her foothold in the Melania Trump crypto art scene. Melania’s Vision The Genesis of $MELANIA With the launch of $MELANIA, Melania Trump has expanded her crypto footprint from art to finance. This token, also built on the Solana blockchain, was introduced amid much speculation and interest, particularly due to Donald Trump’s return to the presidency and his crypto-friendly policies. Announcement and Market Reaction: The $MELANIA token was launched with significant social media promotion, and briefly surpassed a market value of $10 billion, showcasing immediate market interest in her Melania Trump crypto venture. Tokenomics: The MELANIA meme is structured to balance allocation between key stakeholders while ensuring gradual market entry. The total supply is 999.99 million, with a maximum supply of 1 billion tokens. The team vesting schedule is designed to prevent sudden sell-offs. For the first 30 days, team tokens remain locked. After this period, 10% of the team’s allocation (or 3% of total supply) unlocks, while the remaining 90% vests linearly over the next 12 months. This means approximately 2.25% of total supply is released each month, with full vesting completed by month 13. In terms of distribution: 30% is allocated to team vesting, 30% is held in the treasury, 20% is reserved for the community, and 20% is publicly distributed, providing open market access to investors. This tokenomics model aligns with standard practices in crypto, balancing early liquidity with long-term project sustainability. The Cultural and Economic Impact Celebrity Influence: Melania’s involvement in cryptocurrency through NFTs and now tokens reflects a broader trend where celebrities leverage their fame to influence market trends. Her token adds to the meme coin phenomenon, gaining traction based on cultural capital within the Melania Trump crypto sphere. Market Dynamics: The launch of $MELANIA drove interest in Solana meme coins , causing TRUMP price volatility , dropping by 30%. Cultural Phenomenon: Her move into tokens represents a cultural moment where politics, celebrity, and finance intersect in the digital age, with discussions on platforms like X showing both intrigue and critique regarding her Melania Trump crypto endeavors. Melania Trump Crypto: Ethical and Regulatory Scrutiny Conflict of Interest: With a crypto-friendly administration, ethical considerations arise, particularly regarding potential conflicts of interest and policy influence in the Melania Trump crypto context. Regulatory Implications: The launch of tokens by high-profile figures like Melania prompts discussions on the need for clearer regulations, especially when linked to political power. Looking Forward: Potential and Pitfalls Market Potential: If managed strategically, $MELANIA could maintain investor interest, as one of potential new cryptocurrencies to to invest , though the sustainability of such tokens often relies on continued hype and community engagement within the Melania Trump crypto ecosystem. Risks: Given the volatility of meme coins, Melania’s token has already experienced significant fluctuations in value. Although $MELANIA hit an all-time high of $13.73 on Jan 20, 2025 , the Solana meme coin has since retraced to the current value of $1.46, with a market cap of $708.37. Future Ambitions: Whether her crypto ambitions will go beyond this token into broader blockchain technology or digital asset initiatives is yet to be seen. MELANIA Price Chart Conclusion Melania Trump’s journey from NFTs to her own cryptocurrency token marks an intriguing evolution in her digital ambitions. While her entry into NFTs was about art and charity, her venture into tokens taps into the speculative and volatile world of crypto finance. This development underscores the growing intersection of fame, finance, and technology, necessitating a dialogue on ethics, regulation, and the value of celebrity in the Melania Trump crypto space. The post First Lady, First Token: Breaking Down Melania Trump Crypto Ambitions appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Crypto Daybook Americas: Roses Are Red, Violets Are Blue, Inflation Is Hot, but Bitcoin Shines Through
body: By James Van Straten (All times ET unless indicated otherwise)Bitcoin (BTC) continues to climb the wall of worry, pushing above $97,000 despite hotter-than-expected U.S. consumer and producer price inflation reports in the past couple of days. That's a surprise. With prices rising and the likelihood of a Fed rate cut receding, you'd expect risky investments like cryptocurrencies to pause, at the very least. The buoyant behavior is possibly underpinned by signs that inflation is still seen as easing in coming months. "Bitcoin could likely get some relief in the short-term judging by the high-frequency U.S. inflation indicator by truflation which suggests a significant decline in headline inflation over the coming months," said Andre Dragosch, the head of European research at Bitwise. The Truflation U.S. Inflation Index currently shows 2.06%, indicating a potential decline. Dragosch also noted the Federal Reserve's cautious stance, suggesting the central bank is very aware of what happened in the 1970s, when three waves of inflation hit peaks of 6.2%, 12% and 15%. "The Fed is afraid of the 1970s inflation scenario, which is why it rather takes a more cautious approach at the moment and is afraid of cutting rates too aggressively," he said. All that means the bitcoin bull market is far from over if historical trends hold out. Take a look at the 200-week moving average (a period of almost four years!). That's currently around $44,200, below the previous market peak of $69,000 from November 2021. In the past, the average has risen toward the prior record, a move that implies further price growth is on the cards. Also consider that short-term holders have accumulated 1.5 million bitcoin since September, showing continued demand from investors who tend to keep their BTC for less than 155 days. On the public company front, Coinbase followed Robinhood with strong earnings and Gamestop is pondering a bitcoin investment, another potential catalyst for the market. Stay Alert! What to Watch Crypto: Feb. 14: Dynamic TAO (DTAO) network upgrade goes live on the Bittensor (TAO) mainnet. Feb. 14, 2:30 a.m.: Qtum (QTUM) hard fork network upgrade . Feb. 18, 10:00 a.m.: FTX Digital Markets, the Bahamas-based subsidiary of FTX, starts reimbursing creditors . Feb. 21: TON (The Open Network) becomes the exclusive blockchain infrastructure for messaging platform Telegram’s Mini App ecosystem. Feb. 24: Ethereum developers start testing the code for the Pectra network upgrade on the Holesky testnet. Macro Feb. 14, 8:30 a.m.: The U.S. Census Bureau releases January's Retail Sales data. Retail Sales MoM Est. -0.1% vs. Prev. 0.4% Retail Sales YoY Prev. 3.9% Feb. 18, 10:20 a.m.: San Francisco Fed President and CEO Mary C. Daly delivers a speech at the Conference for Community Bankers in Phoenix. Livestream link . Feb. 19, 2:00 p.m.: The Fed releases minutes of the Jan. 28-29 FOMC Meeting. Earnings Feb. 18: CoinShares International ( CS ), pre-market Feb. 18: Semler Scientific ( SMLR ), post-market Feb. 20: Block ( XYZ ), post-market, $0.88 Feb. 26: MARA Holdings ( MARA ), $-0.13 Token Events Governance votes and calls Aave DAO is discussing using GHO as a gas token across various networks. The framework proposes using the canonical network bridge to mint GHO directly as a gas token. Umma DAO is voting on reducing UMA token emissions to optimize its economics. The proposal is to reduce emissions by 14% and assess the impact of the move. Aavegotchi DAO is discussing migrating the protocol to Base over a need to join a chain with “strong ecosystem support.” Arbitrum DAO is discussing upgrading to ArbOS 40 “Callisto,” which includes support for Ethereum’s upcoming Pectra upgrade. Unlocks Feb. 14: Starknet (STRK) to unlock 2.48% of circulating supply worth $15.19 million. Feb. 15: Sei (SEI) to unlock 1.25% of circulating supply worth $13.46 million. Feb. 16: Arbitrum (ARB) to unlock 2.13% of circulating supply worth $46.2 million. Feb. 16: Avalanche (AVAX) to unlock 0.4% of circulating supply worth $43.55 million. Feb. 21: Fast Token (FTN) to unlock 4.66% of circulating supply worth $78.8 million. Feb. 28: Optimism (OP) to unlock 2.32% of circulating supply worth $36.67 million. Token Launches Feb. 14: Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) to be listed on Coinbase , according to a post shared by the Pudgy Penguins account. Conferences: CoinDesk's Consensus to take place in Hong Kong on Feb. 18-20 and in Toronto on May 14-16 . Use code DAYBOOK and save 15% on passes. Day 2 of 2: The 4th Edition of NFT Paris . Feb. 18-20: Consensus Hong Kong Feb. 19: Sui Connect: Hong Kong Feb. 23 to March 2: ETHDenver 2025 (Denver, Colorado) Feb. 24: RWA London Summit 2025 Feb. 25: HederaCon 2025 (Denver) Token Talk By Francisco Rodrigues Binance founder and former CEO Changpeng Zhao’s dog has been the talk of the town. After revealing he had the pet and being bombarded with requests for information, he eventually gave in , knowing memecoins would be launched. Zhao shared a picture of himself with the Belgian malinois named Broccoli in a lengthy post that inspired a slew memecoins. These tokens, trading under the ticker BROCCOLI, debuted both BNB Chain and Solana. Some saw significant price rises right after their introduction to reach billion dollar-plus market caps as traders rushed in. As the hype faded, so did the prices. Fortunes were made and sold over Broccoli. One trader, for example, spent less than $1,000 to create a token inspired by the dog and started selling the tokens just two minutes later. The trader managed to make $6.5 million on the launch, as CoinDesk's Danny Nelson reported . The volatility affected the price of BNB itself, which is now 6.6% lower in the last 24 hours while bitcoin and ether are both up slightly. PancakeSwap’s CAKE token, which was up more than 70% on the week, is down 18%in the same period. Elsewhere, the Trump-backed DeFi protocol WLFI has kept accumulating tokens, purchasing around $5 million worth of wrapped bitcoin (WBTC) and $1.4 million of Movement (MOVE). Derivatives Positioning XRP's perpetual funding rates remain slightly negative, indicating a bias for shorts despite a 10% price surge. Should prices continue to rise, these shorts may throw in the towel, squaring off their bets and adding to an upward move in prices. LTC, XLM and DOGE have seen net buying pressure in perpetual futures, according to the open interest-adjusted cumulative volume delta tracked by Velo Data. title: Shiba Inu Burn Rate Rises 2000% Hinting At SHIB Breakout Soon
body: Shiba Inu burn rate took off 2000% on Friday, boosting market sentiment for the asset despite a broader crypto sector slump. Recent burn metrics highlighted that the massive surge stands primarily attributable to roughly 14 million coins removed from the asset’s market supply in a day. As an upshot, investors eye a bullish movement for SHIB price ahead, fueled by constant hits to the supply as nearly 98 million coins are burned this month. Shiba Inu Burn Shoots Up 2000% Uplifting Market Sentiment According to the latest data by Shibburn on X , the Shiba Inu burn rate sky shot 2004.94% in the past 24 hours. This massive surge is due to 14.27 million tokens removed from the supply intraday. For context, the token burn mechanism reduces the asset’s market supply, offering bullish support to tokenomics. Traders and investors eye this as an optimistic development, anticipating price gains for SHIB ahead. Weekly SHIB Burn Data Simultaneously, it’s worth taking into account that 58.28 million coins were purged from the supply over the past week. This metric further tilts the scales toward the bullish side for the leading meme coin , magnetizing investors to buy the token. Monthly Burn Data Also, burn statistics unveiled by the community’s tracker showed 98.85 million Shiba Inu tokens were burned this month. On average, the community recorded 7.06 million tokens burnt in a day. SHIB Price Braces For Impact? Overall, the constant blows via SHIB burns pulled down the total supply to 589.25 trillion tokens as of press time. Further, 410.7 trillion tokens were sent to a null address, aka burnt, to date. This stat suggested that the asset’s community is close to witnessing nearly 50% of the supply removed permanently. Source: Shiba Burn Statistics As a result, traders and investors remain highly optimistic about a bullish price breakout ahead. At the time of reporting, the SHIB coin’s price traded at $0.00001661, up nearly 2% in the past 24 hours. Its intraday bottom and high were $0.00001596 and $0.00001679, respectively. The weekly chart for the meme coin flagged gains worth over 9%. This rising upside trajectory falls primarily in line with the constant Shiba Inu burns, as spotlighted above. Top Analyst Foresees Bullish Path Ahead Simultaneously, a renowned crypto analyst forecasts a bullish road ahead for the meme token. According to analyst Javon Marks, the price “looks to be setting up in a large Inverse Head & Shoulders pattern and can be finishing up its final shoulder.” This statement suggests that the coin could witness a bullish breakout ahead, with the analyst spotlighting a potential price target of $0.000081. Overall, this target is potentially achievable, given the supply continues to shred due to Shiba Inu burns. Source: Javon Marks, X The post Shiba Inu Burn Rate Rises 2000% Hinting At SHIB Breakout Soon appeared first on CoinGape .

title: CZ calls BSC meme coin ecosystem ‘immature’ amid surge in meme coin activity
body: Binance Founder Changpeng “CZ” Zhao called the meme coin ecosystem on BNB Smart Chain “immature” to be able to handle the soaring demand brought on by a sudden surge in meme coin activity. In his recent post on X , CZ said that the meme coin ecosystem on BNB Smart Chain is “immature.” His comments come in the wake of the recent surge in meme coin activity, driven in part by a frenzy of dog-themed meme coins being launched on the platform after CZ shared a post on X featuring his pet dog named Broccoli. Earlier, BNB Smart Chain launched its native Test (TST) coin, which was initially created as part of a tutorial video for Four.meme launchpad. Although it was not intended for trading, TST experienced a staggering 2,000% surge ahead of its Binance listing, hitting an all-time high of $0.56 before stabilizing at around $0.11, according to Coinmarketcap . The hype was so intense that it has contributed to increased activity on the BNB Chain, with PancakeSwap, a decentralized exchange built on BNB Chain, overtaking Uniswap in terms of daily and weekly trading volumes. In his X post , CZ acknowledged that while meme coins are flooding BNB Smart Chain, the infrastructure supporting them is still struggling to meet the growing demand. He described the ecosystem as “immature” and explained that system performance issues are common in emerging platforms. “Without demand or real traffic, systems can never be tuned perfectly. You’d think they should test it beforehand, and I am sure they do, but the real traffic patterns are always different. On the bright side, there is demand now, and the platforms will improve, albeit with some pain,” he explained. You might also like: CAKE rebounds as PancakeSwap flips Raydium, Uniswap Is BNB Smart Chain on the cusp of a meme coin season? Harrison Seletsky, the director of business development at SPACE ID, said that the launch of TST could be the catalyst for a meme coin season on BNB Chain. He noted that while the idea of a meme coin boom on BSC may have seemed unlikely at first, it could ultimately prove beneficial for the platform. More meme coin trading, Seletsky argued, would bring additional liquidity to the network, attract new users, and further engage the existing community. With Broccoli meme coins flooding BNB, Seletsky’s prediction following the TST surge appears to be coming true. If this trend continues, BNB Chain’s infrastructure will need to evolve quickly to handle the growing wave of traffic and demand. You might also like: BNB reaches new all-time high after PancakeSwap unveils launch platform for BNB meme coins

title: Bitget secures Bulgarian VASP license, expanding European presence
body: Bitget, a leading global cryptocurrency exchange, has been granted a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) license by Bulgaria’s National Revenue Agency. Following the approval , Bitget has been authorized to offer its Bulgarian clients a range of cryptocurrency services. The exchange can now provide services including trading, safe transfers, custody, and cryptocurrency asset exchange thanks to the license. Bitget’s Bulgarinan customers will also be able to participate in public token offerings on the platform. This license gives Bitget greater chances of expanding in the digital assets market. As Bitget pushes to obtain the EU’s Markets in Crypto-Assets license , which would help it strengthen its position in the European market, obtaining the VASP license is a good step in the right direction. Hon Ng, Chief Legal Officer at Bitget, remarked: “As the EU continues to lead with regulatory frameworks like MiCA, we see strong potential for sustainable growth and innovation in the region while maintaining compliance. Bulgaria serves as a strategic gateway for our European expansion, offering crypto-friendly ecosystems the chance to accelerate crypto’s adoption.” You might also like: Binance revamps token information for greater transparency Ng also noted that Bitget intends to continue expanding globally in 2025 while closely monitoring regulatory compliance in each new market it enters. According to Ng, the company has always placed a strong priority on following regulatory norms to preserve market integrity and build user trust. The new milestone comes on the heels of Bitget’s prior license achievements in other countries like El Salvador , the UK, and Vietnam. Because of its efforts to protect users and comply with regulations, Bitget has previously been named by Forbes as one of the most reliable exchanges in the world.
